dynamic_line: Oh no, don't even bother trying.  I've tried that myself countless times, kept telling others about it, but they just won't listen to anyone on it.  Honestly it might even be better as it is now; I'm not sure I'd even want to join them now if they have people like that in there.  But thanks for the offer, I guess.

Oh please no, you don't know the whole situation.  I'm just being mad about this happening, it's really hard not to be mad about this, I hope you understand me.  I know that some people falsely blame others for such things and that I may sound like one of them, but believe me, this is not the case here!  If you don't believe me, go ask...  what's her name...  Uyen, a paramedic woman.  She's Asian as well and had to deal with her too, but managed to get in despite that, so she may tell you more.

responses.text: Well, I believe you now.  I'll go find someone to talk to so that they could let you in.
Thanks, I'll go talk to her.
